welcome_benefits: Gift Voucher Worth Rs. 1,000 from Flipkart/Amazon/Croma/Myntra/Shoppers Stop

Movie & Dining: Get a discount of 10% on BookMyShow
Rewards Rate: 1 Reward Point per Rs. 100 spent offline and 5 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent online.
Reward Redemption: The Reward Points you earn can be redeemed at the RBL Rewards website. 1 Reward Point = Rs. 0.25.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The monthly renewal fee is waived off on spending Rs. 5,000 in the previous month
fees_charges.Foreign Currency Markup: Up to 3.5% on all foreign currency spends
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver for all fuel transactions between Rs. 500 & Rs. 4,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the amount withdrawn or Rs. 500 (whichever is higher)

product_details: A welcome gift voucher worth Rs. 1,000.
Up to 5 Reward Points on every Rs. 100 you spend online.
10% cashback on Zomato, Uber, and Myntra.
Gift vouchers worth up to Rs. 5,000 on achieving the milestone spend.
Spend-based waiver of the monthly membership fee.
1% fuel surcharge waiver up to Rs. 150.
